## Overview

In preparation for this weeks practical please make sure you have the packages `CARNIVAL` and `cosmosR` from Bioconductor installed. 

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
BiocManager::install(c("CARNIVAL", "cosmosR"))
```


Please also install the IBM ILOG CPLEX solver, available through the Academic Initiative from [here](https://www.ibm.com/products/ilog-cplex-optimization-studio).
